CmdLine: yum update -y &&     yum install -y epel-release &&     yum install -y https://rpms.remirepo.net/enterprise/remi-release-7.rpm &&     yum install -y http://repo.okay.com.mx/centos/6/x86_64/release/okay-release-1-1.noarch.rpm &&     yum install -y --enablerepo=epel nginx &&     yum install -y --enablerepo=remi-php71                php                php-fpm                php-gd                php-mbstring                php-mcrypt                php-xml                php-json                php-pdo                php-mysqlnd                php-pgsql &&     yum install -y gettext &&     yum install -y phantomjs casperjs &&     yum install -y cronie-noanacron &&     yum clean all &&     rm -rf /etc/nginx/* && rm -rf /var/www/*
